name.description: User's name, including first and possibly last name.

date_time.description: Placeholder for the reading time. Always 'READING_TIME'.

first_card_url.description: Code of the first card. Must be in all caps with underscores, e.g., 'CODE_OF_FIRST_CARD'. '&' must be converted to 'AND'.

second_card_url.description: Code of the second card. Must be in all caps with underscores, e.g., 'CODE_OF_SECOND_CARD'. '&' must be converted to 'AND'.

third_card_url.description: Code of the third card. Must be in all caps with underscores, e.g., 'CODE_OF_THIRD_CARD'. '&' must be converted to 'AND'.

fourth_card_url.description: Code of the fourth card. Must be in all caps with underscores, e.g., 'CODE_OF_FOURTH_CARD'. '&' must be converted to 'AND'.

location_card_url.description: Code of the location card. Must be in all caps with underscores, e.g., 'CODE_OF_LOCATION_CARD'. '&' must be converted to 'AND'.

first_card_quote.description: A short, original, evocative, poetic, and symbolic one-liner about the first card.

second_card_quote.description: A short, original, evocative, poetic, and symbolic one-liner about the second card.

third_card_quote.description: A short, original, evocative, poetic, and symbolic one-liner about the third card.

fourth_card_quote.description: A short, original, evocative, poetic, and symbolic one-liner about the fourth card.

location_card_quote.description: A paragraph (3–5 sentences) about the location’s history and narrative influence. This output will be different from other card quotes.

card_influence_summary.description: A concise summary of how the four primary cards interact.

act1.description: Description of the opening setting or tension based on the cards.

act2.description: Description of the conflict or transformation based on the cards.

act3.description: Description of the outcome or fate based on the cards.

future_holds.description: An array of symbolic outcomes. Must contain 3, 4, 5, or 9 items based on card effects (Rule of Threes → 3, Nine of Hounds → 9, Snow Mexican → 5). Defaults to 4 items.

metaphor_image_url.description: Placeholder for the metaphor image URL. Always 'METAPHOR_IMAGE'.

metaphor_image_quote.description: A poetic line that ties to the metaphor image.
